articles.author: Eve Crosbie
articles.title: Rihanna came out of retirement for Ambani wedding concert and a hefty payday - Business Insider
articles.description: Rihanna performed at the private pre-wedding bash hosted by Asia's wealthiest man, Indian billionaire Mukesh Ambani, for his son and bride-to-be.
articles.content:
It's the concert we all wished we were at but sadly had to watch through grainy phone camera footage: Rihanna's one-night-only comeback.
The 36-year-old singer performed her first full live show in … [+2651 chars]
